description: Getting Started with iCloud for Mac OS X, iPad & iPhone is perfect for anyone who owns any or all of these devices. 'The Cloud' is an ever growing presence in our daily computing lives and it can become confusing at times. This course is designed to get you started off the right way and untangle the concept of how iCloud works and what it can do for you. You will learn how iCloud syncs your files and information together among all of your devices so you have access to everything you need from all your Apple devices. In addition, we will explore how to take advantage of the sharing capabilities and many other tips and tricks along the way!
title: Getting Started with iCloud for Mac, iPad & iPhone
